name: Darker Neopets 1.2
description: darker version of neopets. Still has a few bugs but hopefully helps you keep eye strain at bay. Best used with premium theme but prob works fine with any darker theme.
additional_info:
1.0 - Launch
1.1 - small changes for random events. Tweak on bank page. improved Trudy's Surprise reward page. Misc improvements.
1.2 - Battledome Update
